p: In regards to time-killing curves, it was observed that the effect of eugenol, at MIC level on the populations of E. coli 128 MR and C. albicans CUSI, showed a bactericidal and fungicidal effect at 2 and 4 h, respectively. Eugenol showed a bactericidal effect against S. aureus 75MR after 1 h of contact. Carvacrol and thymol showed a bactericidal and fungicidal effect at MIC level. This behavior is characteristic of a multiple mechanism of action [ 31].
